summary: Initial setup for FY2024 local file. Uploaded prior year file and financial statements. Selected TNMM for goods purchases based on limited-risk distributor profile.
decisions: TNMM for goods purchases — limited-risk distributor profile, consistent with prior year
Management fee benchmarked at 2% of revenue, aligned with FY2023 approach
Using prior year local file as starting point — structure is largely the same
